verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, a \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G1588"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w acknowledging|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*;

\w In|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that cannot \w lie|strong="G0893"\w*, \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w world|strong="G5550"\w* \w began|strong="G0166"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w hath|strong="G5319"\w* in \w due|strong="G2398"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* is committed \w unto|strong="G4100"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*;

To \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \add mine\add* \w own|strong="G1103"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \add and\add* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*.

For \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w cause|strong="G5484"\w* left \w I|strong="G2641"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou shouldest set in \w order|strong="G1930"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* that are \w wanting|strong="G3007"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ordain|strong="G2525"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* in \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* had \w appointed|strong="G1299"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*:

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G2076"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0410"\w*, the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w accused|strong="G2724"\w* of \w riot|strong="G0810"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unruly|strong="G0506"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* a \w bishop|strong="G1985"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0410"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w steward|strong="G3623"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w selfwilled|strong="G0829"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* soon \w angry|strong="G3711"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given to \w wine|strong="G3943"\w*, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w striker|strong="G4131"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given to filthy \w lucre|strong="G0146"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* a lover of \w hospitality|strong="G5382"\w*, a lover of good \w men|strong="G5358"\w*, \w sober|strong="G4998"\w*, \w just|strong="G1342"\w*, \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, \w temperate|strong="G1468"\w*;

Holding \w fast|strong="G0472"\w* the \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* he hath been \w taught|strong="G1322"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w convince|strong="G1651"\w* the \w gainsayers|strong="G0483"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w unruly|strong="G0506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* vain \w talkers|strong="G3151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w deceivers|strong="G5423"\w*, \w specially|strong="G3122"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*:

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w mouths|strong="G1993"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be \w stopped|strong="G1993"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w subvert|strong="G0396"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w houses|strong="G3624"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w for|strong="G5484"\w* \w filthy|strong="G0150"\w* \w lucre’s|strong="G2771"\w* \w sake|strong="G5484"\w*.

\w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \add even\add* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w Cretians|strong="G2912"\w* \add are\add* \w alway|strong="G0104"\w* \w liars|strong="G5583"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, \w slow|strong="G0692"\w* \w bellies|strong="G1064"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*. \w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w sharply|strong="G0664"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may be \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* giving heed \w to|strong="G4337"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2451"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, that turn \w from|strong="G0654"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

Unto the \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add are\add* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* unto them that are \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unbelieving|strong="G0571"\w* \add is\add* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* is \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*.

They \w profess|strong="G3670"\w* that they \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* in \w works|strong="G2041"\w* they \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* \add him\add*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w abominable|strong="G0947"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w reprobate|strong="G0096"\w*.
